com.ubudu.iot.ble

Class Advertiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubudu.iot.ble.Advertiser

  • public class Advertiser
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by julien on 4/27/17.

    This object provides an API to perform a generic Bluetooth LE advertising.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Advertiser.AdvertisingListener
      Advertising event listener

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String NOT_SUPPORTED_BLE
      Advertising not supported because the device does not support Bluetooth LE
      static java.lang.String NOT_SUPPORTED_CANNOT_GET_ADVERTISER
      Advertising not supported because the android.bluetooth.le.BluetoothLeAdvertiser instance is null
      static java.lang.String NOT_SUPPORTED_CANNOT_GET_ADVERTISER_MULTIPLE_ADVERTISEMENTS
      Advertising not supported because the device does not allow multiple android.bluetooth.le.BluetoothLeAdvertiser instances run at the same time.
      static java.lang.String NOT_SUPPORTED_MIN_SDK
      Advertising not supported because of too low version of Android SDK API
      static java.lang.String SUPPORTED
      Advertising supported flag
      static java.lang.String TAG

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NOT_SUPPORTED_CANNOT_GET_ADVERTISER_MULTIPLE_ADVERTISEMENTS

        public static final java.lang.String NOT_SUPPORTED_CANNOT_GET_ADVERTISER_MULTIPLE_ADVERTISEMENTS
        Advertising not supported because the device does not allow multiple android.bluetooth.le.BluetoothLeAdvertiser instances run at the same time. In fact this means that advertising may be supported in general but there might be a conflict if more than one app on the device try to use advertising.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
